content: ujiji is a pair of elegant and feminine fingerless mitts stretchy and with a tight fit they will fit most adult women your choice of yarn and needles can adjust the size if you want mitts for a small hand use light fingering yarn and needles no 2 5 if you knit for a larger hand you can use needles no 3 25 and fingering or even sport weight yarn merino is a perfect match or you can add some luxury using silk blends or cashmere yardage only 120-140 meters a good project for leftovers
